Personality cocktail
From Go-Quiz.com

so i recently found my book, Susanna Sieglebaum Gives Up Guys, an awesome early 90's novel about a girl who gets confused and screwed over by guys a lot. So for thirty days, she gives up boys and gains some clarity on what shes looking for in a guy and, more importantly, what she isnt looking for in them.



in lieu of Susanna I, too, am giving up boys for thirty days. No new crushes, no sketchy creeps...nothing.
im kind of really excited haha


wish me luck?

i saw someone die today.
this morning on my way to drop off devons dog at the spca to get fixed.
i was really mad at her for making me wake up at 615, go all the way over to her house and then go another 30 minutes to the spca. i was on 35, passing borders and burger king when the car in front of me turned left. i yelled at them to stop. i yelled alot and loud. because a tractor trailer, who had the right of way, was going straight. they didnt stop. either could the truck. the truck pushed the car into the traffic light pole. i couldnt ust drive away so i called the police and pulled over since i know cpr and first aid. the guy had his seat belt on and his airbag went off, but it was useless. he was breathing, and was making sounds, then his breath went shallow and then stopped. i cired my eyes out. i didnt know what else to do. there was nothing i could do but wait. the poor trucker was sobbing and miserable. the poloce finally arrived and asked me questions, i couldnt believe it happened. they let me go and i went to the spca the woman was giving me a hard time, i couldnt deal with her crap. i dropped the dog off and left. when i was on my way home, the whole road was closed for a mile.
i cant believe i was mad at my sister this morning. or worried because the dog got mud on my jeans. it couldve been me in that car. i was turning next. who knows what could happen.

so yesterday i went into hot topic because i havent been in there in a long time and i was buying an amazing shirt and i saw one of those rubber bracelet things and it was black and iwas like hmm what could that possibly be for...support death? haha in that store, you never know. so i picked it up and it said "rock the arts" and it was to raise money for art programs bc schools are cutting them left and right. and that bothers me. a lot. because the generation of younger kids are growing up on video games and computer games which creates the environment for you. you get to imagine nothing. art, meaning music and writing too, are how kids learn to imagine and create their own little world. and art and music classes were my favorite in elementary school and i think that they are just as important as the core subjects.


but thats just me.

"but i love you" she whispers as he walks into the hotel room with someone else. -lucy davis, Untitled.

"maybe in the end, she didnt really understand sex, or love, or how the two of them did or did not fit together" anna percy, the A List

"i dont care if sex is casual, fantasy or feelings actual...i wont be your stepping stone to any sort of bullshit throne" -fiction plane

"i want so badly to believe that there is truth...that love is real. and i want life in every word to the extent that its absurd." -postal service

"i may be lonely, but im not that cheap." -fiction plane

"She sat wondering how it was possible to want something so far out of her reach so badly.
So badly that she sometimes ached and would shed tears of longing. Knowing that he was having the same exact thoughts of another girl." lucy davis, Untitled.

"And there it was. She spun her board towards shore, paddled like hell, and felt the water rush under her. She rose to her feet.
Be the wave. Be the wave.
Arms out, knees bent, totally concentrating on the moment, Anna Percy rode the wave. She laughed with joy as the wall of water powered her towards shore. Life, love, boys--it was all about balance." -anna percy



i just dont get it. things are so complicated. its about balance, right? how do you go aout finding what that balance is when you dont even know what it is that you are balancing? how can it be that you feel something so strongly in a such futile situation? how can you feel so much for someone who doesnt feel that way towards you and probably never will? this whole system is unfair. and i cant help but wonder...where will i be this time next year? and who will i be there with?

so what if your friends think im crazy?

 well i wasnt trying to impress those girls anyway.

 theyre all theory no action.

 where im from...we live like its the latest attraction.

 

i dont know what happened this year...but im different. It has a lot to do with that one night last summer and me getting so sick. Ive realized theres more to life than caring what people think of me. Sure, i still do care...who doesnt? And yes, during highschool i was that girl who wore the colored tights and the 80's clothes and i had fun doing it. but thats not what i mean. i mean that im free to be who i am...and no one can stop me. i say whats on my mind and i love it. and yeah, ive sort of gotten better at standing up for myself, but nearly as good as i need to be. ive made so many new friends this year, friends who are like myself, just out for a good time. i dont need drama, i never did. andi think dawn says it best "you can be mature and very fun, one of the most responsible people i know, but everytime im with you...i feel like im on crack"

 

all i need is the beach. and everything will be okay. (which opens in 52 days, btw)

i forgot how much i liked my livejournal! i havent been here in like 80 million years, but oh well.

hey everyone <3! only 88 days until memorial day weekend!
la la laaa happy new year!
this week has been great. im so happy :) yay!

my mom and i at the broadway diner while my dad is paying:
Mom: (to me doing a lunge-ish stretch while opening the door)Tristen, is there a reason as to why you must look so weird while opening the door?
Tristen: My muscle is tight.
Mom: Well, maybe you could save that for your bedroom? Or atleast the house?
Tristen: No. (finishing stretching, closing door)
Mom: Of course not.
Tristen: What do I care what a bunch of strangers who I'll never see again think of me because i happened to use my time effeciently to open a door and stretch my leg? DO you think i care what they thnik of me for that one second?
Mom: True. Thats never stopped you before.
Tristen: Nope. It never will either.
Mom: ...I need some of whatever your taking.
Tristen: Doesnt everyone? Everyone should be able to frolick merrily, uncaring of other peoples thoughts. They should be able to wear pink tights over their heads while dancing on a hamburger and playing with a tomagotchi and leading an orchestra.
Mom: i dont even know what someone says to that.

but anyway, its nice to know that you guys are here for me <3

because the rain will surely come.

its weird. nothing really interesting has happened the past few days. im kinda nervous that it might have been the calm before the storm.

or..maybe my luck has changed and nothing bad is going to happen.

HAHAHAHAH. that would be nice.

Dear Boy,
      I dont know if i know you, or if we have met. maybe we have and we know we have the potenial to be so much more but are too scared to change anything. maybe we never have met, but when we do, we'll know that it is something special. In the beginning i may try to push you away, but thats just because im scared that you just might be a nice guy who likes me and im not used to that, i tend to fall for jerks who treat me like garbage. i have a history of horrible events that cause me to hesitate beginning relationships. but i promise ill work through it, please PLEASE dont give up on me. All i want is to be able to call you and tell you about my day. I want you to do the same. I want to know that you are there for me, always. I want you to know that i dont get jealous very easily and will give you the utmost trust. I expect you will do the same for me. And in the beginning i may be too shy to kiss you, but please dont you feel shy, i wont push you away or slap you. I want to tell you everything and i want you to feel you can tell me anything. I want to hear what you have to say. I want you to listen to what i have to say. and i dont want us to spend every night together, please, hang out with your friends, i know i will be with mine. and please, never change for me, i wont like it. i want you to be the same boy i fell for..i know people change a little all the time, and thats okay, but nothing too crazy, okay? im not into petnames, so dont even think about it. and on those nights we are together, and theres nothing to do, maybe we could just go for a walk or play a game. maybe some times we could go grocery shopping with my mom. i want you to become a such a part of my life that my dogs dont even jump on you anymore. i want you to try to understand me, but you dont have to completely, nor do i expect you to, seeing as how i dont even understand myself. please know that sometimes, even though ill try to fight it, i do get in bad moods, chances are, it has nothing to do with you and everything to do with me. and when we do get into a fight, can we please talk about it? and then we'll get through it. but most importantly i want you to be my best friend and ultimate supporter. but, please dont patronize me. i enjoy honesty. i need honesty. i also need frequent trips to the beach to play frisbee. is that too much to ask? i wish i knew if this would last. i wish it would but every relationship is like a new deck of cards, and unfortunately, i tend to, well, suck at playing cards. maybe you could teach me how to play?
                                                                Sincerely,
                                                                tristensarah

im a an evil witch.

im selfish.

i dont care about anyone other than myself.

all i do is whine and complain.

i do nothing to help out.

i dont deserve ____. (fill in the blank)

im never going to amount to anything.

she doesnt know why i am even bothering with school, ill probably fail anyway. (did she forget im on the Dean's List?)

i act all high and mighty and think i am better than her.

she did nothing to deserve being treated like this.

my life according to my mother... i guess family game night meant nothing to her?

 

 

i guess i need to do some growing up.

Let me be a little kinder, let me be a little blinder to the faults of those about me; let me praise a little more; let me be when i am weary just a little bit more cheery; Let me serve a little better those that i am striving for. Let me be a little braver when temptation bids me waver. Let me strive a little harder to be all that i should be. Let me a little meeker with the brother that is weaker. Let me think a little more of my neighbor and a little less of me....

i wish i was like that

last night my friend and i were talking and he said that while he's been in relationships before, hes never been able to completely let himself go. hes always had a check on his feelings. and he wonders if hes  missed out. and i found myself agreeing with him. its true the only (serious) relationship ive ever had was with chris. and i gave it everything i had. he held my heart in his hands and it got handed back to me, after a year and a half. and the feeling of it ending sucked. completely sucked. and then i have issues with trust. i dont have it for a lot of people. and i have my reasons. men scare me. they scare me to death. i have my reasons there too. two guys asked me out this week and they were both really great, one especially, but i cant say yes. i cant get myself to. i hate opening up to new people. i hate having to build a trust. 
sound stupid? 
welcome to my world

i cant help but wonder what would happen if i told you the truth

[(honestymakesmepuke)]

this is going to be me stating a few facts. tonight someone decided they know everything about my life and how i live it. they felt they had the knowledge and insight to give me commentary. some of you may not like it so i suggest you dont read it.

i am not a spoiled brat. i have worked for just about everything i have. i own two cars. that i paid for. i pay for the gas. no i dont pay my insurance because i have good grades. the second i dont, i pay my insurance. i work three jobs, at the very least. not including being a student. i volunteer much of my free time to coaching st james cross country and track. i am not perfect. i make mistakes once and a while. sometimes i step out of the little box i made the mistake of creating for myself. forgive me. or dont. whatever i dont care. my life has been far from perfect. while most of my friends are planning parties and sleep overs, im scheduling doctors appointments. i live my life based on how im feeling, which usually isnt good. i am very sick i just dont like telling people what is acutally wrong with me. but i dont care anymore. i dont care. think what you want, you will anyway. sometimes i need to be home early. sometimes i cant go out at night. i am sick with things i wouldnt wish on my worst enemy. sure on the outside my family appears all american, but we arent. its all an act. well most of it anyway. im sick of people making things up about me and spreading rumors. what did i ever do to you? huh? please tell me so i can fix it. im sick of people taking advantage of the fact that i am a nice, honest, giving person. im sick of people taking advantage of me in general because they know i dont know how to stand up for myself. im sick of people being two faced and stabbing each other in the back. i hate the fact that there are only a certain number of people outside my family that i know i can trust. and those of you included should know who you are. im just asking for people to be nice again. to treat me and everyone else with respect. you dont know what im dealing with or going through so watch what you say, please. because sometimes, i get down too. please deal with the fact that although i try to be happy a lot, im not happy all the time. please dont expect me to be.

Bold what applies to you:

01. I have kissed someone of the same sex on the lips.
02. I see (have seen) a therapist.           03. I'm the youngest child.
04. I am drawn to things associated with sadness.  05. I did love my gauged earrings.

i heard that you were living well
but you dont look like your living to me.
though the sparkle is gone, your smile is in place,
so that everyone watching will see.
You've got them all convinced.

hold it now, you've got everyone convinced
that youre alright
when no one else is quite as vulnerable.

((try to understand theres an old mistake that fools will make. im the king of them, pushing everything thats good away from me))

Maybe the past is like an anchor holding us back. Maybe, you have to let go of who you are to become who you will be

that is so true.




youve become a part of me and i cant imagine life without you now. take it as you please. take it as you are. just take it <3

i have to laugh at myself. i really do. i cant believe i believed you. i cant believe i fell for the things you were saying. i cant believe i let my guard down. and i never let my guard down. thats why i dont do this. ever.

so, next time you talk to me, i'll be laughing. and its not because you just told a funny joke but because i let myself become part of your prank.

man, i must be an idiot.

 

(if i feel stupid now--wait til you realize what you did...)


[well thanks for waiting this long to show yourself cause now that i can see you, i dont think you're worth a second glance] -dc

when you have a broken heart, they always say there are plenty more pebbles on the beach or fish in the sea or stupid things like that. well that may be true, for everyone who isnt me, i mean. why would any pebble or fish want to spend the rest of their life with me? some one who is incapable of love. not because i cant do it. but because i wont do it. and its not like ive never been in love before. ive felt love, definitely, but then i felt the emptyness and pain that comes when that love takes a turn or worse yet, isnt returned. and i know you shouldnt go through life avoiding love because of the possible pain but if i know the situation is hopeless, why should i even bother. i just wish i knew if i should fight this battle?

i want to fight this battle. im prepared..i have the equipment necessary, including a back-up heart. so this battle may be long, tedious and bloody but in the end, it'll be worth it.

or so i hope?

i dont know whether its the warmth of his fingers or the kindness in his smile that banishes my fear, but suddenly i am convinced that everything is going to be all right. -sam sharpe

 


oh, and. a woman's best defense against breast cancer is early detection. two minutes once a month for self exams could just be the thing that saves your life. yes, i am asking you to fondle yourself...or have someone else do it for you. just do it. dont let it happen to you.

rooney and i were talking last night and we stumbled upon an awesome revelation..which is this:

this summer, we had a great time. our friends were incredible and we spent so many nights with them all. dan, matt, mike h, sara, justin, jeff, shannon, sean, nick, pete, mike m, the col(l)in's, chris, taylor and everyone else. even if we didnt have plans at 7 pm..we could just call one of those people and we'd have plans by 705. the monday night parties were unforgettable. so are all of the ship ahoy people. and cait flan <3

but whats even more incredible than that is this winter (yes..we know its not winter yet..but its not summer so it doesnt matter).  we became friends with another group of amazing people. lorraine (duh! <3), peter, josh, mike a, nick, tina, bob and mario and anyone else. and when i asked meg how we we always end up with a great group of friends around us...she said "because we deserve it..we really do. we're good people, theyre good people. and good people find each other"

I can tell that you don't know me anymore
It's easy to forget, sometimes we just forget
And being on this road is anything but sure
Maybe we'll forget, I hope we don't forget

this goes for alot of things. it goes for my friends the most though. ive known most of the people im friends with now for years and years. i have grown apart from some of my friends and thats no ones fault but it just shows that the people who were friends are in the past. the people who we are now are different and just can't relate to each other. im sorry about that. i wish it didnt happen. i really do. but the fact is, life changes and we cant help it. we just have to move with it and remember the good times because no one can ever take those away from us. and please...know that even though we might not be best friends anymore, i will always ALWAYS be here for you. because best friends--past or current, can't turn their backs on one another. and the friends that have lasted are the ones who have let me grow and change and do my own thing without expecting the same old tristen they knew when they were 5,9,14,16 even 17 to show up on their doorstep. they appreciate the fact that are that secure enough of our friendship to accept that. so thanks. to everyone. i love you all

-tristensarah

my hopes are so

                             high

       that your kiss might kill me.

   so wont you

                                            kill me?

 so i die happy...

 

my heart is yours to fill or burst. to break or bury or wear as jewelry, whichever you prefer.

i know people change.

thats expected and part of life.

i know you cant stay the same forever--

i wouldn't want you to.

 

but i never imagined it would come to this.

this facade of what we used to be.

when the sun has set and the pooldeck is dry, when we've fallen out of love with that perfect guy, when the summer is over, and we're back in school...when we can't keep spending our days in the sun, when there's no sand in these pockets of ours, when the tears are running down our face, when the world has turned  snowy, and were sittin in our rockers getting cold, we will still be best friends...because it will be warm again.

im everyones best friend

the one they can always come to

whom they can tell their deepest, darkest secrets

and whom they can trust with anything

because im like the sister they never had

especially for those boys.

 

i dont want to be your sister because that would make what i want illegal in most states

broken glass in condomania. (thats all im saying about that...)

growing up sucks. i miss you guys. a lot. remember..i love you. <3

THE PEANUT ON THE ROAD! hanging out with josh! Getting shot by priests...only not really. i love you sejhammer. you are amazing and you can always make me laugh.

dont ever leave me <3

last night was so great. after everything with rooney calmed down. we had the greatest night. rooney and i met up with lorraine, kristen and col(l?)in in rb, walked around saw hot sophomore, who is now a junior then went to mad hatter where the bouncer asked me how old my kids were. so apparently i looked old enough to have 4 18 year old kids. cool. hopefully he was just really drunk. then we went outside and lucky for them black bear ben didnt have any marks on him. i wanted to park far away but they wouldnt let me haha. then we went back to red bank where we ran into taisha...yeahhhh. that girl rocks. umph. then we saw mike m! that was fun. but at the point i really had to um utilize the facilities so that caused meg and i to rush the whole scene. then after an long searh we found an bathroom and all was well in the world. but leads me to this thought: i have known kristen since 3rd grade, meg since...im not quite sure when i met you..you were just kind of always..there. and i met lorraine like 5 months ago and those three girls are just soo amazing. sure kristen and i dont hang out as much as we used to but i know if i ever needed her she would be there for me. and lorraine and roondawg just know when i need them. i dont even have to ask. i love them all.

nothing has happened in the past few days. and i couldnt be happier.

 its about time nothing happens to me <3

ill never understand him.

 

or why he did the things he did.

 

i hope hes happy.

really.

 

because he deserves everything he gets.

the past few days...the world has really let me down. but today the generosity of the human spirit showed me that sometimes, people can surprise me.

all it takes is one nice thing to make the past few days seem better .

it just feels like im never supposed to have fun. or be healthy.

 i dont mean to whine.

but it feels like every time i let go and act 18 or when something nice finally happens to me or open up to someone new. i get my head slammed into a brick wall.

twice.

why arent i allowed to have fun? what did i do wrong?
